row.desc: Initializing the graph, pass in the edges as a list.
Returns all possible paths from one point to another.
Returns the shortest possible path from one point to another.
Adds node, with an edge from the start node to the new node.
Adds an edge from the start node to the end node.
Deletes the edge from the start node to the end node, if there is one.
Deletes the node, and all edges connected to it.
Displays the graph in the console, as its dictionary.
